meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Derek Arnold Nancy Akerman Joe Morse Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6801.

td.p: Derek Arnold, a system developer from Akron, Ohio
Nancy Akerman, a science policy fellow from Arlington, Virginia
Joe Morse, a Coast Guard helicopter mechanic originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,400)

tr.td: CAMPING
MAPS
TENSE
GRAIL MIX
FOREST KNOWLEDGE
INSECT, REPELLENT

(Joe: What is bella terre?)
(Alex: No. Got caught there, didn\'t you, Joe?)
(Joe: I did.)

bel paese

JoeDerek
Triple Stumper
')
